vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Human Resources Department to contract with Delta Dental Plan of Ohio, Inc. to align with changes resulting from collective bargaining for the period January 1, 2025 through February 28, 2025. ($0.00)
vote.description:
Explanation
BACKGROUND:  
This ordinance authorizes and directs the Director of the Department of Human Resources to modify the contract with Delta Dental Plan of Ohio, Inc., as Exhibit A needs to be updated to reflect changes, due to collective bargaining. No increase in costs or additional services are being awarded and it would not be in the best interest of the City to pursue the normal procurement processes in Chapter 329 because the contract term of the Delta contract has not expired. 
 
Title
To authorize the Director of the Human Resources Department to contract with Delta Dental Plan of Ohio, Inc. to align with changes resulting from collective bargaining for the period January 1, 2025 through February 28, 2025. ($0.00) 
 
Body
WHEREAS, it is in the best interest of the City of Columbus to contract with Delta Dental Plan of Ohio, Inc. to update Exhibit A for the period January 1, 2025 through February 28, 2025; NOW, THEREFORE,
 
BE IT ORDAINED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
SECTION 1.                      That the Director of the Department of Human Resources is hereby authorized to enter into a contract modification with Delta Dental Plan of Ohio, Inc. to update Exhibit A for the period January 1, 2025 through February 28, 2025, which is incorporated herein by reference, to align with changes resulting from collective bargaining.
 
SECTION 2.  That this ordinance shall take effect and be in force from and after the earliest period allowed by law.
